ai-patthana8.17:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles, illustrious and confusion,
ai-patthana8.17:1.1_0: Not for the sake of livelihood or the defilement, and for the sake of defilement,
ai-patthana8.17:1.1_1: Not for the sake of defilement and not for the sake of defilement, or for the sake of defilement,
ai-patthana8.17:1.1_2: nor do states for the sake of having a defilement, but not for the sake of (wholesome) thoughts. Because of the monks and without cause or reason.
ai-patthana8.17:2.1_0: Not for the sake of searching, or for the teaching, and for the sake of defilement, or for the sake of a cause or reason.
ai-patthana8.17:2.1_1: Not for the sake of searching, or for the sake of defilement, or for the sake of defilement,
ai-patthana8.17:2.1_2: Not based on hearing, nor defilement, or dependently originated the defilement, or causes monks, there is no cause or condition.
ai-patthana8.17:3.1_0: nor for the sake of livelihood, namely, or for the sake of defilement, or for the sake of non-confusion, and for the sake of defilement, and for the sake of defilement.
ai-patthana8.17:3.1_1: nor for the sake of livelihood, namely, or for the sake of defilement, or for the sake of non-confusion, and for the sake of defilement, and for the sake of defilement.
ai-patthana8.17:3.1_2: nor for the sake of (winding) dissatisfaction, or both; there is no defilement and phrases, without pollutants, giving rise to the defilements,
ai-patthana8.17:3.1_3: This is the section in brief.
